title: Storm Capsizes Boats During Regatta In Alabama
teaser: Authorities continue to search for four people still missing after a storm swept through a sailboat regatta in Alabama Saturday.
contentencoded:
Four people are missing and two are dead after a strong storm swept into the Mobile Bay during the Dauphin Island Regatta on Saturday.

Here & Now’s Robin Young speaks with Michael Dumas, reporter for The Press-Register in Mobile, Ala. after the tragic incident.

  • Watch: GoPro video footage of the storm crossing the Dauphin Island Regatta

Guest:

  • Michael Dumas, reporter for The Press-Register in Mobile, Ala. He tweets @MichaelDumasPRO.
